message.content: We refer to genetics resources for help. Leber hereditary optic neuropathy is a mitochondrial disorder that is passed down by the mother through the egg. Fathers cannot pass down the disease to their offspring. Therefore, the correct response is (B) No, the father cannot pass the disease to any offspring.
